maqras.text: 26|111|Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami tomara prati imana anima neki athaca tomaka kerala nimnasraenira manuhe'i anusarana karaiche’
26|112|nuhe ka’le, ‘sihamte ki karae seya jana mora ki prayojana
26|113|‘sihamtara hicapa loraa kerala mora pratipalakarahe kama; yadi tomaloke buji palahemtena
26|114|‘arau muminasakalaka khedi pathi'oraa mora kama nahaya.
26|115|‘Ma'ihe kerala ejana spasta satarkakarai’.
26|116|Sihamte ka’le, ‘he nuha! Yadi tumi birata nohoraa tente arasye tumi sila daliya'i nihata karaa sakalara antarbhukta ha’ba’.
26|117|Nuhe (praarthana karai) ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Mora sampradaye moka asbikara karaiche’.
26|118|‘Seye tumi mora arau sihamtara majata spasta mimansa karai diya lagate moka arau mora lagara muminasakalaka raksa karaa’.
26|119|Phalata ami te'omka arau te'omra lagata yisakala achila sakaloke boja'i narata araohana karaa'i raksa karailo.
26|120|Tara pichata baki thaka sakalaka duba'i marailo.
26|121|Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechi bhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|122|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|123|Ada sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|124|yetiya sihamtara bhatr hude sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|125|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|126|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|127|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|128|‘Tomaloke kiya pratito ucca sthanata ayatha saudha nirmana karaa
26|129|‘arau tomaloke enekai prasadasamuha nirmana karai acha, yeniba tomaloka sthayi.
26|130|‘Arau yetiya tomaloke aghata karaa tetiya sbecchacarai hai aghata karaa.
26|131|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa.
26|132|‘Arau tomaloke takbaraa aralambana karaa se'i sattara yijane tomalokaka dana karaiche se'i sakalo bisaya, yibora tomaloke jana.
26|133|‘Teraemi tomalokaka dana karaiche catuspada jantu arau putra santana
26|134|‘udyana arau jharnasamuha
26|135|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe eta maha dirasara sastira bhaya karao’.
26|136|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amaka upadesa diya ba nidiya, ubhaye amara babe samana.
26|137|‘Eya purbarartisakalarahe sbabhara.
26|138|‘Ami ketiya'o sastipraapta naha'om’.
26|139|Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile, phalata ami sihamtaka dhbansa karailo. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|140|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|141|Chamuda sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|142|yetiya sihamtara bhatr chalehe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|143|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|144|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|145|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|146|‘Iyata yi ache tata tomalokaka niraapade erai diya ha’bane
26|147|‘udyana arau jharnasamuhata
26|148|‘sasyaksetrata arau sukomala joka bisista khejura baganata
26|149|‘arau tomaloke nipunatara saite pahara kati yibora grha nirmana karaicha.
26|150|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa.
26|151|‘Arau tomaloke simalanghanakarai sakalara nirdesara anugatya nakaraiba
26|152|‘yisakale prthiraita biparyaya srsti karae arau sansodhana (tatha santi sthapana) nakarae’.
26|153|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi haicha yadukaraibilakara an'yatama.
26|154|‘Tumi dekhuna amara darae'i ejana manuha, seye tumi yadi satyabadi horaa tente eta nidarsana lai aha’.
26|155|Te'om ka’le, ‘e'ijani haiche (nidarsaniya) uta, iyara babe ache pani khoraara pala, arau tomalokara babe'o ache eta nirdharaita dinata pani khoraara pala.
26|156|‘Arau tomaloke iyara kono anista sadhana nakaraiba, yadi (anista sadhana) karaa tente maha dirasara sasti tomalokara oparata apatita ha’ba’.
26|157|Tathapi'o sihamte se'i utajanika badha karaile, parainamata sihamta anutapta ha’la.
26|158|Eteke sastiye sihamtaka graasa karaile. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechibhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|159|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|160|Lutara sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|161|yetiya sihamtara bhatr lute kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|162|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|163|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|164|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|165|‘Srstijagatara majata tomaloke kerala purausasakalara ocarate'i upagata horaa
26|166|‘arau tomalokara pratipalake tomalokara babe ye straisakalaka srsti karaiche sihamtaka tomaloke barjana karai thaka? Baram tomaloke haicha eta simalanghanakarai sampradaya’.
26|167|Sihamte ka’le, ‘he luta! Tumi yadi birata nohoraa, tente niscaya tumi bahiskara ha’ba’.
26|168|Te'om ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara karmaka ghrna karao.
26|169|(Te'om praarthana karai ka’le,) ‘he mora raba! Moka arau mora paraiyalaka sihamtara e'i karmara paraa raksa karaa’.
26|170|Phalata ami te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka raksa karailo.
26|171|Kerala se'i brd'dhajanira bahirae, yijani achila pichata arastharakarai bilakara antarbhukta.
26|172|Tara pichata ami bakibilakaka dhbansa karailo.
26|173|Arau ami sihamtara oparata sastimulaka silabrsti barsana karailo. Eteke bhiti pradarsitasakalara babe e'i brsti kimana ye nikrsta achila
26|174|niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechibhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|175|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|176|A'ikara adhibasisakale'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|177|yetiya chu'a'ibe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|178|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|179|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|180|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
